reviewText: I bought this DVD to learn crochet.  It is very useful.  Videos are east to understand.  Would buy this as a gift.  Very happy with the purchase.

This is not a good product.  The "teacher" is not at a level to be able to teach.  She doesn't have a professional technique and if I didn't already know enough about crochet, I would not be interested in learning crochet since the end product looks so amateurish.  Not worth the price.
